overview_of_class: This course examines inequality in American society with an emphasis on race, class, and gender. Lectures emphasize the mechanisms through which inequality develops and comes to be seen as legitimate, natural, and desirable. We will also examine the economic, social, and political consequences of rising inequality. We will place special focus on poverty and inequality in Native North America.
name: Social Inequality: Race, Class, and Power
title: WCAS SOCIOL 201-0-20 Social Inequality: Race, Class, and Power
